lead_paragraph: Yael Melamede takes a lighthearted look at lies through the lens of the behavioral economist Dan Ariely in this documentary.

headline.print_headline: Moms Do It; Traders Do It; We All Do It, Experts Say
headline.main: Review: ‘(Dis)Honesty — The Truth About Lies’ Assumes Everyone Tells Them

snippet: Yael Melamede takes a lighthearted look at lies through the lens of the behavioral economist Dan Ariely in this documentary.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Yael Melamede documentary film (Dis)Honesty -- The Truth About Lies.
